RESOURCE.DESCRIPTION: Results from query to NASA/IPAC Extragalactic Database (NED), which is operated by the Jet Propulsion Laboratory, California Institute of Technology, under contract with the National Aeronautics and Space Administration. This work was (partially) supported by the US National Virtual Observatory development project, which is funded by the National Science Foundation under cooperative agreement AST0122449 with The Johns Hopkins University.

FIELD.name: No.
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A sequential data-point number applicable to this list only.

FIELD.name: Frequency targeted
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The frequency or wavelength at which the data apply (in common astronomical jargon, e.g. "V" for the Johnson Vband, "IRAS 12 microns" for the IRAS 12 micron band, etc.)

FIELD.name: Refcode
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The NED 19-digit Bibliographic Reference code.

FIELD.name: Major Axis
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The major axis (2a) as published. It can be a radius

FIELD.name: Major Axis Flag
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The major axis flag as published. (2a) - is diameter, which is default, (a) - means radius.

FIELD.name: Major Axis Unit
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The major axis unit's as published.

FIELD.name: Minor Axis
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The minor axis (2b) as published. It can be a radius

FIELD.name: Minor Axis Flag
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The minor axis flag as published. (2b) - is diameter, which is default, (b) - means radius.

FIELD.name: Minor Axis Unit
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The minor axis unit's as published.

FIELD.name: Axis Ratio
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The axis ratio, as published: it can be b/a, a/b or log a/b.

FIELD.name: Axis Ratio Flag
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The axis ratio flag: b/a, a/b or log a/b.

FIELD.name: Major Axis Uncertainty
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The major axis uncertainty, as published.

FIELD.name: Ellipticity
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The ellipticity as published. (1-b/a)

FIELD.name: Eccentricity
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The eccentricity as published. [(a/b)^2-1]/[(a/b)^2+1]

FIELD.name: Position Angle
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The position angle as published.

FIELD.name: Equinox
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The equinox as published.When the equinox is followed by an asterisk, it means that no equinox was published, and the value given is assumed by NED.

FIELD.name: Reference Level
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The reference level, with units, for the diameters. For an optical diameter, this might be an isophote (surface brightness); for a radiodiameter, it might be a half-peak level; etc.

FIELD.name: NED Frequency
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The frequency or wavelength of observation, translated as needed in Hz.

FIELD.name: NED Major Axis
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The major axis, translated as needed in arcseconds.

FIELD.name: NED Major Axis Uncertainty
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The major axis uncertainty , translated as needed in arcseconds.

FIELD.name: NED Axis Ratio
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The axis ratio b/a.

FIELD.name: NED Ellipticity
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The ellipticity as calculated in NED, based on paper.

FIELD.name: NED Eccentricity
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The eccentricity as calculated in NED, based on paper.

FIELD.name: NED cos-1_axis_ratio
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The cos**(-1)(a/b), calculated be NED.

FIELD.name: NED Position Angle
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The position angle, translated as needed to degrees for equinox J2000.

FIELD.name: NED Minor Axis
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The minor axis, translated as needed, in arcseconds.

FIELD.name: Minor Axis Uncertainty
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The minor axis uncertainty, as published.

FIELD.name: NED Minor Axis Uncertainty
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The minor axis uncertainty in arcseconds.

FIELD.name: Axis Ratio Uncertainty
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The axis ratio uncertainty, as published.

FIELD.name: NED Axis Ratio Uncertainty
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The axis ratio uncertainty, if original paper has it.

FIELD.name: Ellipticity Uncertainty
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The ellipticity uncertainty, as published.

FIELD.name: NED Ellipticity Uncertainty
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The ellipticity uncertainty, as calculated by NED from the published values.

FIELD.name: Eccentricity Uncertainty
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The eccentricity uncertainty, as published.

FIELD.name: NED Eccentricity Uncertainty
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The eccentricity uncertainty, as calculated by NED from the published values.

FIELD.name: Position Angle Uncertainty
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The position angle uncertainty, as published.

FIELD.name: NED Position Angle Uncertainty
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The position angle uncertainty, calculated in degrees.

FIELD.name: Significance
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The type of uncertainty reported in the original publication.

FIELD.name: Frequency
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The frequency or wavelength of observation as given in the paper.

FIELD.name: Frequency Unit
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The frequency or wavelength unit as given in the paper.

FIELD.name: Frequency Mode
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The method(s) by which the data were collected, reduced, or derived, in elation to the frequency or wavelength.

FIELD.name: Detector Type
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The observing instrumentation.

FIELD.name: Fitting Technique
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The observing technique.

FIELD.name: Features
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The observing features.

FIELD.name: Measured Quantity
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The part of the object measured.

FIELD.name: Measurement Qualifiers
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The qualifiers of measurement mode.

FIELD.name: Targeted RA
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The object's RA as published.(HHMMSS)

FIELD.name: Targeted DEC
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The object's DEC as published.

FIELD.name: Targeted Equinox
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The object's coordinates equinox as published.

FIELD.name: NED Qualifiers
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Self-explanatory notes pertaining to the history of the data or to the adjustments to the data or to changes introduced by NED.

FIELD.name: NED Comment
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Other information about the data.

TR.TD: A radius is given in DIA_MAJ, not a diameter
A radius is given in DIA_MAJ, not a diameter
